name: 數理統計（二）
description: 本課程是研究隨機現象統計規律的一門學科。它提供統計研究與應用的理論基礎。內容包括多變量分配之介紹、極限定理、參數之估計及檢定、迴歸模型、統計量之充分性、完備性、獨立性等，期能建構推論統計學的理論基礎。
goals: 建構推論統計學的理論基礎
奠定未來資料分析應用實務之基礎
syllabus:
每週主題(各一週，期中考和期末考各一週，共18週)

01: Maximum Likelihood Estimation

02: Rao-Cramer Lower Bound and Efficiency

03: Maximum Likelihood Tests

04: Multi-parameter Estimation and Testing

05: Properties of a Sufficient Statistic

06: Completeness and Uniqueness

07: The Exponential Class of Distributions

08: Minimal Sufficiency and Ancillary Statistics

09: Sufficiency, Completeness and Independence

10: Most Powerful Tests

11: Uniformly Most Powerful Tests

12: Likelihood Ratio Tests

13: The Sequential Probability Ratio Test

14: Minimax and Classification Procedures

15: Quadratic Forms

16: One-way ANOVA and Multiple Comparisons

methodologies.note: 講述數理統計重要概念與理論
